Title: Indignation
Writer: Philip Roth (based on the novel by), James Schamus (written for the screen by)
Actors: Tijuana Ricks, Sue Dahlman, Jason Jiang, Logan Lerman
Plot: Set in 1951, the story follows Marcus Messner, the idealistic son of a humble kosher butcher from Newark, N.J. Marcus leaves for Ohio to study at a small, conservative college, where he finds himself at odds with the administration, grapples with anti-Semitism and sexual repression and pines after a troubled girl.
Production: FilmNation, Roadside Attractions, X-Filme Creative Pool, Likely Story
